data_table.description: Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SDXA1B
variable.description: [Administrative informaion]. Type of review. Q1b [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]

variable.name: SDXA3
variable.description: [Review of computer's MI diagnosis] Were any of the exclusionary conditions for diagnostic criteria met? (see Part D for exclusionary conditions). Q3 [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]

variable.name: SDXA4A
variable.description: [Review of computer's MI diagnosis]. For which exclusionary condition(s) did you find evidence in the clinical record? (Specify all up to three that apply from list in Part D) 1st exclusion condition. Q4a [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]
variable.value: Major head (brain) trauma; e.g. epidural hematoma, subdural hematoma, skull fracture
Neoplasm; e.g., primary or metastatic brain/CNS neoplasia (malignant or benign)
Coma due to metabolic disorders or disorders of fluid or electrolyte balance; e.g., due to diabetes, hypoglycemia, epilepsy, hypovolemia, poisoning, drug overdose, uremia, or liver disease
Vasculitis involving the brain; e.g., SLE, radiation, etc.

Hematologic abnormalities (considered exclusionary if present prior to event under consideration); e.g., thrombogenic conditions (e.g. DIC) are exclusionary for thrombotic or embolic strokes, hemorrhagic conditions (e.g. DIC, anticoagulant or thrombolytic therapy, thrombocytopenia) are exclusionary for brain hemorrhage or subarachnoid hemorrhage
CNS infection: brain abscess, granulomas, meningitis, encephalitis, or any specific infection involving the brain or meninges

variable.name: SDXA5
variable.description: [Review of computer's MI diagnosis]. Stroke diagnosis. Q5 [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]

variable.name: SDXA6
variable.description: [Stroke classification]. If you assigned C (Definite Brain Infarction, Thrombotic) as a diagnosis in item 5, was infarction lacunar. Q6 [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]

variable.name: SDXA7
variable.description: [Stroke classification]. If you assigned C or G (definite or probable infarction, thrombotic) as a diagnosis in Item 5, Do you think the infarction was caused by a carotid atherosclerotic embolus (70-99% occluded ipsilateral carotid)? Q7 [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]

variable.name: SDXA1CY
variable.description: Year of SDX completion [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC surveillance event ID (Cir) [Stroke Final Diagnosis Form, SDX]
